text: The People Power Party (), formerly known as the United Future Party () is a conservative political party in South Korea. The party was formed on 17 February 2020. It was a merger of the Liberty Korea Party, New Conservative Party, and Onward for Future 4.0. After the 2020 legislative election, it became the 2nd largest party in the National Assembly, with 103 MPs. ==References== Category:Political parties in South Korea Category:2020 establishments in South Korea
title: People Power Party (South Korea)
